title: AI investments in Singapore over the last 12 months

title: How AI Can Raise Airline Ticket Prices
description: Airlines, including Delta, are testing artificial intelligence in pricing. Get ready for what one startup calls the “exploitation phase.”
content: Frequent flyers and consumer-rights advocates often complain about the convoluted nature of airline ticket prices. Discount tickets can quickly become expensive through the use of “drip pricing,” extra fees for once-free amenities such as checked bag... [1133 chars]

title: Ramayana producer Namit Malhotra is ready to ‘spend even 3 times’ its budget of Rs 4,000 cr, he is making it with ‘shiddat’, says trade analyst Komal Nahata: ‘Ranbir Kapoor is best actor…’
description: Leading film trade analyst Komal Nahata reveals Namit Malhotra of Prime Focus plans to release the two-part Ramayana in 30-50 languages using Artificial Intelligence. "It's waiting to explode on screens across the world," he claimed.
content: Nitesh Tiwari’s upcoming two-part mythological epic Ramayana is one of the most talked about Indian films around the globe, ever since the makers unveiled the first glimpse last month. The star-studded ensemble and the cutting-edge visuals and worldb... [4035 chars]

title: Are AI-powered schools the future? Not so fast

content: An Austin private school is off on an ambitious experiment in artificial intelligence. Alpha School has already graduated its first class of students schooled through AI, The New York Times reported. While this educational approach raises valid conce... [3224 chars]

title: Demis Hassabis on our AI future: ‘It’ll be 10 times bigger than the Industrial Revolution - and maybe 10 times faster’
description: The head of Google’s DeepMind says artificial intelligence could usher in an era of ‘incredible productivity’ and ‘radical abundance’. But who will it benefit? And why does he wish the tech giants had moved more slowly?
content: If you have a mental image of a Nobel prizewinner, Demis Hassabis probably doesn’t fit it. Relatively young (he’s 49), mixed race (his father is Greek-Cypriot, his mother Chinese-Singaporean), state-educated, he didn’t exactly look out of place recei... [14665 chars]

title: Dhanush slams AI-edited Raanjhanaa re-release: “This isn’t the film I made”
description: the film’s climax was altered using Artificial Intelligence (AI) — without the consent of lead actor Dhanush or director Aanand L Rai.
content:
Earlier, even fans and filmmaker Aanand L Rai were seen expressing their disappointment over the AI-generated alternate climax of the acclaimed romantic drama.

title: Artificial intelligence could end disease, lead to "radical abundance," Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis says
description: At Google DeepMind, researchers are chasing what's called artificial general intelligence: a silicon intellect as versatile as a human's, but with superhuman speed and knowledge.
content:
This is an updated version of a story first published on April 20, 2025. The original video can be viewed here.
